0.title: This Is Scarlett and Isaiah Premiere

episode of.title: This Is Scarlett and Isaiah (TV Series 2013–2014)

0.plot:
Know what this is about?
 Be the first one to add a plot.

1.title: This Is Scarlett Making Potato Chips

episode of.title: This Is Scarlett and Isaiah (TV Series 2013–2014)

1.plot: Scarlett visits a local potato farm and picks potatoes by hand. She also gets to pick them by riding a big machine called the Potato Harvester. After picking the potatoes she heads to the kitchen and makes crunchy potato chips with the help of the farmer.

2.title: This Is Isaiah Picking Pumpkins

episode of.title: This Is Scarlett and Isaiah (TV Series 2013–2014)

2.plot: Isaiah visits a pumpkin patch and chooses to carve his ghost pumpkin into a ghost. Using a marker, Isaiah draws the pieces he needs to cut out to make his scary pumpkin face. He also snacks on the roasted pumpkin seeds he helped make.

3.title: This Is Scarlett Riding Ponies

episode of.title: This Is Scarlett and Isaiah (TV Series 2013–2014)

3.plot: Scarlett visits a petting zoo and gets to meet and feed a variety of animals including ponies, deer, sheep, and peacocks. Best of all, Scarlett gets to ride a pony!

4.title: This Is Isaiah Playing Witth Balloons

episode of.title: This Is Scarlett and Isaiah (TV Series 2013–2014)

4.plot: Isaiah joins a balloon artist that shows him how to twist balloons into different dinosaurs. Isaiah and his little sister get a ginormous surprise when they get to play with a 20-foot balloon T-Rex. Let's hope this T-Rex doesn't have sharp teeth!

5.title: This Is Scarlett Making Spaghetti and Meatballs

episode of.title: This Is Scarlett and Isaiah (TV Series 2013–2014)

5.plot: Scarlett meets a pasta chef who shows her how to make dough then feed it into a machine that cuts it into long, thin strips. The two of them also roll up some meatballs and share a yummy Italian feast.

6.title: This Is Isaiah Helping with the First Day of School

episode of.title: This Is Scarlett and Isaiah (TV Series 2013–2014)

6.plot: Isaiah lends some big brother support during his little sister's first day at Pre-Kindergarten. With Isaiah's help, Ariah has an awesome first day at school.

7.title: This Is Isaiah Learning About Reptiles

episode of.title: This Is Scarlett and Isaiah (TV Series 2013–2014)

7.plot: Isaiah loves reptiles, especially alligators. Isaiah gets up close and personal with a variety of turtles, snakes, lizards and iguanas. Before the end of his visit, Isaiah feeds an alligator! Gasp!

8.title: This Is Scarlett Feeding Butterflies

episode of.title: This Is Scarlett and Isaiah (TV Series 2013–2014)

8.plot: Scarlett gets up and close to hundreds of butterflies when she visits the butterfly conservatory. Scarlett tours the conservatory, spotting her favorite butterflies and helps the curator make a new butterfly feeder.

9.title: This Is Scarlett Making a Hula Hoop

episode of.title: This Is Scarlett and Isaiah (TV Series 2013–2014)

9.plot: Scarlett loves spinning and decorating. Lucky for her today she gets to do both! Scarlett meets a professional hula hooper who shows her how to make her very own hoop, and takes her hula hooping with other kids in the park.

10.title: This Is Isaiah Making a Pinata

episode of.title: This Is Scarlett and Isaiah (TV Series 2013–2014)

10.plot: Isaiah visits a piñata maker who shows him how to construct a paper mache piñata using an inflated balloon, "engrudo" a flour based homemade glue and coloured paper. Isaiah is then invited to a Mexican themed party and smashes the piñata with his new friends.

11.title: This Is Isaiah Drawing with Chalk

episode of.title: This Is Scarlett and Isaiah (TV Series 2013–2014)

11.plot: Don't worry, Isaiah's not hovering over a canyon, he's standing on a massive 3D chalk drawing! Isaiah meets a chalk artist who shows him how to make his very own chalk and then they get busy drawing on the sidewalk.

12.title: This Is Isaiah Making a Birthday Card

episode of.title: This Is Scarlett and Isaiah (TV Series 2013–2014)

12.plot: Isaiah surprises his mom by making an extra special pop-up card for her birthday. Isaiah picks his mom's favourite colours and glittery paper to make a beautiful card.

13.title: This Is Scarlett Making a Tiara

episode of.title: This Is Scarlett and Isaiah (TV Series 2013–2014)

13.plot: Scarlett's favourite thing to collect is jewellery, but the one thing she is always wanted is a tiara. Today, Scarlett meets a jeweller who shows her how to make a sparkly one.

14.title: This Is Scarlett Grooming Pets

episode of.title: This Is Scarlett and Isaiah (TV Series 2013–2014)

14.plot: Scarlett meets a pet groomer who shows her how to groom different types of pets. Together they give a dog a bath, brush a furry cat and trim the nails on a bunny.

15.title: This Is Isaiah Learning to Be a Mechanic

episode of.title: This Is Scarlett and Isaiah (TV Series 2013–2014)

15.plot: Isaiah visits a car mechanic and learns about the different tools car mechanics use to fix cars. Isaiah changes a tire, checks the oil levels and gets to see the undercarriage of a car.

16.title: This Is Isaiah Making Roller Skating

episode of.title: This Is Scarlett and Isaiah (TV Series 2013–2014)

16.plot: Isaiah joins a veteran skater for his first roller skating lesson. Isaiah learns how to keep his balance, skate forward and how to stop. Isaiah invites Mom and Dad to join in the fun.

17.title: This Is Isaiah Making Wontons

episode of.title: This Is Scarlett and Isaiah (TV Series 2013–2014)

17.plot: Isaiah wears his chef hat and joins celebrity chef Roger Mooking who shows him how to make wontons. Isaiah seasons the meat and folds the wontons by hand to make a bite-sized delicious snack.

18.title: This Is Isaiah Making Chocolate Bars

episode of.title: This Is Scarlett and Isaiah (TV Series 2013–2014)

18.plot: Isaiah gets to explore a chocolate shop! Isaiah learns the different steps cocoa beans have to take to become a bar. Isaiah mixes ingredients to create different choco-licious bars.

19.title: This Is Scarlett Ringing Bells

episode of.title: This Is Scarlett and Isaiah (TV Series 2013–2014)

19.plot: Scarlett has been invited to join a local hand bell choir. Scarlett gets to ring all sorts of bells from tiny little ones to a gigantic bell on top of a tower. Ding Dong!

20.title: This Is Making Shadow Puppets

episode of.title: This Is Scarlett and Isaiah (TV Series 2013–2014)

20.plot: Isaiah meets a puppet expert and learns how to make shadow puppets out of paper. After making a ninja puppet, Isaiah puts on a shadow puppet show for a group of kids.

21.title: This Is Isaiah Blowing Bubbles

episode of.title: This Is Scarlett and Isaiah (TV Series 2013–2014)

21.plot: Isaiah meets bubble expert, Geoff Akins Hannah (BubbleWonders.com) who shows him some awesome tricks you can do with bubbles. Isaiah bounces a giant bubble on his hand, blows tiny bubbles inside a large one, makes a foggy bubble and a square bubble, and even gets himself inside a gigantic bubble! Pop!

22.title: This Is Scarlett Making Fortune Cookies

episode of.title: This Is Scarlett and Isaiah (TV Series 2013–2014)

22.plot: Scarlett puts on her chef hat and joins a baker who shows her how to make fortune cookies. Scarlett writes her own fortunes, mixes the ingredients, and gets to eat the freshly made fortune cookies. Yum!

23.title: This Is Scarlett Playing Dodgeball

episode of.title: This Is Scarlett and Isaiah (TV Series 2013–2014)

23.plot: Game on! Scarlett joins a dodge ball coach for a speedy one on one lesson. She learns how to dodge, dip, duck, jump and run fast. All of which comes handy when Scarlett joins a team of kids for a fun match of dodge ball.

24.title: This Is Scarlett Learning Jiu Jitsu

episode of.title: This Is Scarlett and Isaiah (TV Series 2013–2014)

24.plot: Watch Scarlett hit the Jiu Jitsu mat and take no falls. Scarlett wears her Gi and learns to throw, kick, and punch from a black belt Jiu Jitsu master. Back off!

25.title: This Is Isaiah Making Sausages

episode of.title: This Is Scarlett and Isaiah (TV Series 2013–2014)

25.plot: Isaiah visits a butcher and gets to make yummy breakfast sausages. Isaiah seasons the meat and puts his muscles to work when he turns the sausage maker's handle.

26.title: This Is Scarlett Vising the Museum

episode of.title: This Is Scarlett and Isaiah (TV Series 2013–2014)

26.plot: Scarlett visits the children's museum where she builds a castle using giant building blocks, plays a floor piano, has a boat race at the water table, and best of all gets to play in a huge pin wall! The museum is so much fun!

27.title: This Is Isaiah Making T-Shirts

episode of.title: This Is Scarlett and Isaiah (TV Series 2013–2014)

27.plot: Isaiah meets an artist who shows him how to stamp T-Shirts with different designs. Isaiah uses silk screens, fabric paint and a funny tool called a "squeegee" to stamp designs on different T-Shirts including one for his little teddy bear.

28.title: This Is Scarlett Playing with Hair

episode of.title: This Is Scarlett and Isaiah (TV Series 2013–2014)

28.plot: Today, she meets a talented hairdresser who shows her how to make hair from drab to fab! Scarlett practices cutting hair on a mannequin, styles her mom's hair and tries different hairstyles.

29.title: This Is Scarlett Sewing a Quilt

episode of.title: This Is Scarlett and Isaiah (TV Series 2013–2014)

29.plot: Scarlett meets an aboriginal quilt artist who shows her how to make a quilt for her nana. Scarlett uses a sewing machine, cuts patterned fabrics into different shapes to make a family tree themed quilt.

30.title: This Is Scarlett Making a Sock Puppet

episode of.title: This Is Scarlett and Isaiah (TV Series 2013–2014)

30.plot: Scarlett is putting on a puppet show and you're invited. Scarlett works with a professional puppeteer to learn how to make a sock puppet. Scarlett creates a fairy puppet and with her new friend, Scarlett, puts on a fairy dust puppet show.

31.title: This Is Isaiah Dog Sledding

episode of.title: This Is Scarlett and Isaiah (TV Series 2013–2014)

31.plot: Isaiah learns about different forms of travel when he goes dog sledding. On a snowy day, Isaiah helps care for a pack of huskies before learning the call signs to tell them where he wants to go.

32.title: This Is Scarlett Building a Snow Sculpture

episode of.title: This Is Scarlett and Isaiah (TV Series 2013–2014)

32.plot: Scarlett puts on her winter jacket because she's heading outside to build a big snow sculpture! Scarlett meets an expert who shows her how to make a horse snow sculpture that she can slide off. Scarlett learns how to handle, pack and sculpt snow using different tools. Scarlett slides down the horse over and over again!

33.title: This Is Scarlett Training a Puppy

episode of.title: This Is Scarlett and Isaiah (TV Series 2013–2014)

33.plot: Scarlett meets a dog trainer who teaches her how to help take care of a new puppy. Scarlett joins a puppy kindergarten class and teaches the puppies how to walk on leash and respond to different commands.

34.title: This Is Isaiah Going Swimming

episode of.title: This Is Scarlett and Isaiah (TV Series 2013–2014)

34.plot: Isaiah loves to swim and today he visits an Olympic swimming pool. Isaiah meets a coach that teaches him how to do a cannonball, a star float, and a backstroke. Isaiah also meets and races a gold medal Paralympian swimmer.

35.title: This Is Isaiah Playing with His Food

episode of.title: This Is Scarlett and Isaiah (TV Series 2013–2014)

35.plot: Isaiah likes packing his own lunch and today he gets to pack a dinosaur for lunch! Isaiah meets a chef who shows him how to play with his food and make it look fun and taste yummy.

36.title: This Is Scarlett Polka Dancing

episode of.title: This Is Scarlett and Isaiah (TV Series 2013–2014)

36.plot: Scarlett gets her first formal polka dancing lesson. Scarlett meets a polka dancer teacher who shows her to gallop, jump back and forth and spin polka style. Scarlett gets to dance with a partner and other kids to the beats of a live band.

37.title: This Is Scarlett Making a Birthday Cake

episode of.title: This Is Scarlett and Isaiah (TV Series 2013–2014)

37.plot: Scarlett's wants to surprise her dad by making a birthday cake for his birthday. Scarlett and a chef work together to make and decorate a chocolate fudge heart-shaped cake. Now it's time to blow the candles!

38.title: This Is Isaiah Making a Smoothie

episode of.title: This Is Scarlett and Isaiah (TV Series 2013–2014)

38.plot: Isaiah can't wait to use the bike blender when he visits a local grocery store. Isaiah combines her favorite fruits and vegetables to make a tasty healthy drink treat.

39.title: This Is Isaiah Jumping on a Trampoline

episode of.title: This Is Scarlett and Isaiah (TV Series 2013–2014)

39.plot: Isaiah visits a trampoline gym and meets a coach that shows him how to bounce like a pro. Isaiah practices star jumps, bum jumps and a seat drop half turn jump.

40.title: This Is Scarlett Trying on Shoes

episode of.title: This Is Scarlett and Isaiah (TV Series 2013–2014)

40.plot: Scarlett visits the shoe museum and meets a shoe expert who shows her weird, old, colorful, funny, tall and crazy shoes from all around the world. Scarlett tries on different shoes and paints a wooden clog to take home to mom.

41.title: This Is Isaiah Doing Magic

episode of.title: This Is Scarlett and Isaiah (TV Series 2013–2014)

41.plot: Isaiah joins magician Neil Croswell and learns how to perform some magic tricks. Isaiah watches Neil perform and he even gets to levitate!

42.title: This Is Scarlett Learning About the Circus

episode of.title: This Is Scarlett and Isaiah (TV Series 2013–2014)

42.plot: Scarlett goes to circus school! Scarlett meets a circus expert who takes her on a whirlwind ride through different circus acts including walking on a tight rope! Go!

43.title: This Is Isaiah Hip Hop Dancing

episode of.title: This Is Scarlett and Isaiah (TV Series 2013–2014)

43.plot: Isaiah takes his first hip hop dancing lesson! Isaiah meets an award-winning hip hop dancer who shows Isaiah some awesome moves. Isaiah gets to show off his new moves when he joins a kid's hip-hop dancing crew.

44.title: This Is Isaiah Doing Science Experiments

episode of.title: This Is Scarlett and Isaiah (TV Series 2013–2014)

44.plot: Isaiah has become a mad scientist! He's making putty, jelly volcanoes, and magic mud that drips through your fingers! Now who's going to clean all this mess up?

45.title: This Is Scarlett Making Masks

episode of.title: This Is Scarlett and Isaiah (TV Series 2013–2014)

45.plot: Scarlett loves dressing up and playing pretend. Today, Scarlett meets an expert mask maker who shows her how to make a princess mask out of cardboard.

46.title: This Is Scarlett Taking Care of Her Little Brother

episode of.title: This Is Scarlett and Isaiah (TV Series 2013–2014)

46.plot: Scarlett has a new baby brother and she wants to be a helpful big sister. Scarlett visits a baby expert who shows her the things she can do to help mommy take care of Jasper.

47.title: This Is Scarlett Making Clay Animals

episode of.title: This Is Scarlett and Isaiah (TV Series 2013–2014)

47.plot: Scarlett learns how to work clay into a baby sea lion. Scarlett picks gold coloured clay and rolls the clay into the shape of a baby sea lion. When she is done, she puts her creation in the oven to harden.

48.title: This Is Isaiah Climbing

episode of.title: This Is Scarlett and Isaiah (TV Series 2013–2014)

48.plot: Isaiah scales a climbing wall! Isaiah learns about the safety equipment climber's use and why it is important to have someone with you when you climb walls. With his harness on, Isaiah climbs his way up to the top of different colourful climbing walls.

49.title: This Is Scarlett Playing Around the World

episode of.title: This Is Scarlett and Isaiah (TV Series 2013–2014)

49.plot: Buckle up! Scarlett is taking us around the world. Scarlett drives a cargo boat, rides a Pakistani bus, makes origami in a Japanese house and learns how to play the Nigerian drums. What a great way to travel!

50.title: This Is Isaiah Launching a Water Rocket

episode of.title: This Is Scarlett and Isaiah (TV Series 2013–2014)

50.plot: Isaiah loves learning about space and today is he lucky day as he visits the Aviation and Space Museum! Isaiah trains to be an Astronaut, tries the flight simulator, and launches water rockets with the help of the museum's tour guide. 3, 2, 1 Blast off!

51.title: This Is Scarlett Making a Pizza

episode of.title: This Is Scarlett and Isaiah (TV Series 2013–2014)

51.plot: Scarlett learns firsthand how her favorite food is made. Scarlett learns the art of pizza making from a local pizza maker. Not only does Scarlett make a meatball pizza, but best of all she learns how to make a dessert one. Yum!

52.title: This Is Isaiah Milking a Cow

episode of.title: This Is Scarlett and Isaiah (TV Series 2013–2014)

52.plot: Isaiah visits the Agricultural Museum and gets the cutest task of all. Feeding the baby animals! First Isaiah bottle feeds the baby lambs, and then he learns how to milk a cow and how to feed the calves.

imdb.plot outline: "This is..." is an award-winning live-action television series that opens up the world to preschoolers. In "This is..." young viewers are offered the rare opportunity to see one of their own exploring, learning and creating. During series 3, seven-year-old hosts, Scarlett and Isaiah, embark on brand new exciting adventures and discover the world in their own way. "This is Scarlett and Isaiah" will continue the legacy set forth by the first two incarnations and update it with two new fresh-faced hosts embarking on brand new exciting adventures - all from a preschooler's perspective.
imdb.title: This Is Scarlett and Isaiah
plot: "This is..." is an award-winning live-action television series that opens up the world to preschoolers. In "This is..." young viewers are offered the rare opportunity to see one of their own exploring, learning and creating. During series 3, seven-year-old hosts, Scarlett and Isaiah, embark on brand new exciting adventures and discover the world in their own way. "This is Scarlett and Isaiah" will continue the legacy set forth by the first two incarnations and update it with two new fresh-faced hosts embarking on brand new exciting adventures - all from a preschooler's perspective.::Anonymous
